'''Lunar Chain''' is [[Mona]]'s [[Level 2 Constellation]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* The automatic Charged Attack does not consume [[stamina]].
* The Charged Attack created from this constellation does not interrupt the Normal Attack sequence.
* Once the constellation is triggered, player or third-party sources can't interrupt the animation.
